[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: fund()] [Response Size Limits] Is there a maximum response size when calling text().await at line 95, or can memory exhaustion attacks be mounted with gigantic hex strings? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: create_account()] [Empty Response] Can an empty response body at line 67 cause hex::decode or bcs::from_bytes to panic or behave unexpectedly? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: fund()] [Transaction Payload] Does the client validate that SignedTransaction contains the expected transfer payload and recipient at line 101, or can the faucet send arbitrary transaction types? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: fund()] [Gas Price Manipulation] Can a malicious faucet return transactions with extremely high gas prices at line 101, causing the client to waste funds on transaction fees? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: create_account()] [Redirect Following] Does the client follow 3xx redirects, and if so, can attackers redirect to malicious servers to capture request parameters or inject fake responses? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: fund()] [Error Status Ambiguity] Can HTTP 4xx/5xx errors contain valid transaction data in the body, causing confusion between error responses and successful operations at lines 94-98? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: create_account()] [Status Code Forgery] Can intermediate proxies modify status codes from 500 to 200, causing the client to process error responses as valid transactions at line 68? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rest-client/src/faucet.rs] [Function: build_and_submit_request()] [Token Revocation] If a token is revoked after with_auth_token() but before build_and_submit_request(), can this cause security issues or leak information about token status? (Low)
